issue.title: [Go][CI] Switch C Data to use cgo.Handle (bumps to Go1.17)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17646](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17646). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Requires bumping our minimum Go version to 1.17, since we're keeping with the N-2 cycle of Go and go1.19 was released a few months ago, bumping to 1.17 is safe.

This then allows us to remove the custom backported version of cgo.Handle for the C Data interfaces and use `runtime/cgo`'s Handle
